Famo.us, meet AngularJS.

Famo.us/Angular offers the best of both worlds: the rendering strength of Famo.us and the structure of AngularJS.

Easily generate surfaces with ng-repeat

Loop surfaces in your views to keep your MVC logic separated and clean. 

1 <fa-modifier fa-translate="[square.x, 40]" ng-repeat='square in squares'>
2   <fa-surface fa-size="[40, 40]" class="square">
3   </fa-surface>
4 </fa-modifier>

Combine Angular bindings with Famo.us attributes

Allow users to easily dictate surface sizes and translation distances by leveraging Angular bindings. 

1 <input type="range" ng-model="translateX">
2 
3 <fa-modifier fa-translate="[translateX, 0]">
4   <fa-surface fa-size="[40, 40]" class="square">
5   </fa-surface>
6 </fa-modifier>

Conditionally add surfaces or modifiers with ng-if

To be written! 

1 <button ng-click="!translate">
2 
3 <fa-modifier fa-translate="[50, 0]" ng-if="translate == true">
4   <fa-surface fa-size="[40, 40]">
5   </fa-surface>
6 </fa-modifier>
